name: Fast Flats
description:
You belong to Flast Flats Inc., a company that decorates the interior of peoples’ home.

However, Flast Flats is no ordinary company: it operates on very short notice and with very little budget. That means you may have to hurry up and do with factory discarded furniture!

  • 🏢 Visit and decorate five different interiors for various people, composing with their taste!
  • 🪓 Mix-and-match brands, colors and materials to give the flats a unique look and feel !
  • 🎷 Enjoy evolutive lounge music soundtrack to avoid panicking during your work!
